gobatis.select: SELECT * FROM gobatis_users where id=#{id} order by id
gobatis.insert: INSERT INTO gobatis_users (nickname,password,description,name,birth,address, host_ip, host_mac,host_ip_ptr,host_mac_ptr,sex,contact_info,create_time, field1,field2,field3,field4,field5,field6) VALUES (#{nickname},#{password},#{description},#{name},#{birth},#{address},#{host_ip}, #{host_mac},#{host_ip_ptr}, #{host_mac_ptr},#{sex},#{contact_info},#{create_time}, #{field1},#{field2},#{field3},#{field4},#{field5},#{field6}) returning id;
gobatis.update: UPDATE gobatis_users SET name = #{u.name}, nickname = #{u.nickname}, password = #{u.password}, description = #{u.description}, birth = #{u.birth}, address = #{u.address}, host_ip = #{u.host_ip}, host_mac = #{u.host_mac}, host_ip_ptr = #{u.host_ip_ptr}, host_mac_ptr = #{u.host_mac_ptr}, sex = #{u.sex}, contact_info = #{u.contact_info}, create_time = #{u.create_time} where id = #{id};
